item.title: OpenShift
item.author: iris.garcia.desebastian@gmail.com (Iris Garcia)
item.description: Requirements Create account in RedHat Create a new account using the Sign up form. Sign in into OpenShift. Install the OpenShift client wget https://mirror.openshift.com/pub/openshift-v4/clients/oc/4.1/linux/oc.tar.gz tar xvzf oc.tar.gz sudo cp oc /usr/local/bin/ The binary can be copied to any place as long as it is included in the $PATH. Get the Login command Create a Dockerfile OpenShift can create a docker image given a source git repository, but it needs a Dockerfile definition which is shown below:
